name: Pool Together Reinvest
description: Supplies {{token}} to [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) to earn POOL. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. If strategy wins prize of the week, prize will also be added to the strategy.

en.name: Pool Together Reinvest
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) to earn POOL. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. If strategy wins prize of the week, prize will also be added to the strategy.

fr.name: Pool Together Reinvest
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) pour gagner du POOL. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie. Si stratégie remporte le prix de la semaine, le prix sera également ajouté à la stratégie.

es.name: Pool Together Reinvest
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) para ganar POOL. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia. Si la estrategia gana el premio de la semana, el premio también se agregará a la estrategia..

de.name: Pool Together Reinvest
de.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) to earn POOL. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. If strategy wins prize of the week, prize will also be added to the strategy.

tr.name: Pool Together Reinvest
tr.description: POOL kazanmak için [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com)'a {{token}} sağlar. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır. Strateji haftanın ödülünü kazanırsa, ödül de stratejiye eklenecektir.

vi.name: Pool Together Reinvest
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) to earn POOL. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. If strategy wins prize of the week, prize will also be added to the strategy.

zh.name: Pool Together Reinvest
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) 赚取 POOL 奖励。收获奖励后卖掉换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。如果本周中奖，奖金也会被复投。

hi.name: Pool Together Reinvest
hi.description: POOL कमाने के लिए {{token}} को [Pool Together](https://app.pooltogether.com) पर सप्लाई करता है। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है। यदि रणनीति सप्ताह का पुरस्कार जीतती है, तो पुरस्कार भी रणनीति में जोड़ा जाएगा।
